entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or periods of light snow. Fog. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog dissipating in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
